Text: The worst movie ever. If you really wanna watch how bad a movie can be, then download, else you probably will puke.

It's about god damn time!  Was looking forward to a sequel for the last 15 years!

Don't ruin it by telling me how it ends.
Alternate Title: "James Cameron Needs to Eat - Let's Blow This Shit Up".

@corezz:
Cameron is naturally in no way affiliated with this "movie".
This is the WORST movie I have ever seen. Period. I could make a better movie with my home video camera and my family as actors.
